text: 12.7: 1 Ko 14.26; Ef 4.7; 1 Pi 4.10-11Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar, ana won ŋkasŋkar za kha gumgi gu mbigi bevbevira, ana anan mbe ndɨɨim, harigi gumgi gu mbigi ana ganɨv kaŋgirga, khe Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar ma. Ana ntan bevbevira mbe nɨɨŋgi, mbe maaŋ muuŋgip ana sios vhen ki gumgi, mbe mben kurkurarga.
